sentence: Add 250 μl of Cell Resuspension Solution
Add 250 μl of Cell Lysis Solution
Invert 4 times to mix
Add 10 μl of Alkaline Protease Solution
Invert 4 times to mix
Incubate 2 minutes at room temperature
Add 350 μl of Neutralization Solution
Invert 4 times to mix
Centrifuge at top speed for 5 minutes at room temperature
Insert Spin Column into Collection Tube
Decant cleared lysate into Spin Column
Centrifuge at top speed for 30 seconds at room temperature
Discard flowthrough
Reinsert Spin Column into Collection Tube
Add 750 μl of Wash Solution
Centrifuge at top speed for 30 seconds
Discard flowthrough
Reinsert Spin Column into Collection Tube
Add 250 μl of Wash Solution
Centrifuge at top speed for 30 seconds
Discard flowthrough
Reinsert Spin Column into Collection Tube
Centrifuge at top speed for 1 minute at room temperature
Discard flowthrough
Transfer Spin Column to a sterile 15 ml microcentrifuge tube
Add 100 μl of Nuclease-Free Water to the Spin Column
Centrifuge at top speed for 1 minute at room temperature
Discard Spin Column
